class.name: org.openelisglobal.observationhistorytype.valueholder.ObservationHistoryType
class.comment: defines the possible classes of values allowed in the demo. history table.

column.name: type_name
column.comment: a short tag (1 word) for this type. What was asked "Gender", "HIVPositive" etc.

column.name: description
column.comment: a long description of this type.

column.name: lastupdated
column.comment: the last time this item was written to the database.
